name: Seeking After It with Saurabh Rajput
name_original: Seeking After It with Saurabh Rajput
description: Seeking After It with Saurabh Rajput is a punishing 3D single player game, a real challenge for the stoic players. You move the player to the left and to the right using the "A" & "D" keys and that's all there is. With practice you will be able to use the gravity and other forces to your advantage to move your cube in the desired direction. Great mysteries await the master seekers who reach the top. •The five Platonic Solids were thought to represent the five basic elements: earth, air, fire, water, and the universe. Plato envisioned Earth’s building blocks as cubes, a shape rarely found in nature. Between 2 minutes and infinite hours of agonizing gameplay, experience the world between the sky and earth as a platonic cube  • Lose all your progress, over and over. • Feel new types of frustration you didn't know you were capable of. “Excellence" is not a gift, but a skill that takes practice. We do not act "rightly" because we are "excellent",in fact we achieve "excellence" by acting "rightly" - Plato
